dialogueLines.line: Finally, I've found you, little twerp!
dialogueLines.speaker: dad

dialogueLines.line: I will not approve of you leeching onto my daughter!
dialogueLines.speaker: dad

dialogueLines.line: Also, I don't need your approval, old man!
dialogueLines.speaker: bf

dialogueLines.line: You and me. A one-on-one rap battle!
dialogueLines.speaker: dad

dialogueLines.line: Didn't have enough of last time?
dialogueLines.speaker: bf
